heroSubtitle: Professional wedding website designs that tell your unique story and create a seamless experience for you and your guests.
chooseYourPackage: Choose the package that best fits your needs
packageFormIntro: Please provide your details to get started with your selected package. Our team will be in touch shortly.
packageRequestReceived: We've received your request! Our team will contact you shortly to discuss next steps for your wedding website.
featureSubtitle: We create beautiful, functional wedding websites that make your special day even more memorable.
personalizedDesc: We tailor every website to match your vision, style, and unique love story.
rsvpDesc: Streamline guest management with our easy-to-use RSVP functionality.
fullSupportDesc: From creation to launch, we're here to guide you every step of the way.
attentionDesc: Every element is crafted with care to ensure your website is perfect.
processSubtitle: Our streamlined approach ensures your wedding website is beautiful, personalized, and ready on time.
discussDesc: We start with understanding your unique love story, style preferences, and wedding details.
step1Point1: Share your wedding theme and color palette
step1Point2: Tell us about your love story
buildDesc: Our expert team creates a beautiful, functional website that perfectly captures your style.
step2Point1: Custom design based on your specifications
launchDesc: Your beautiful website goes live with our full support for your big day.
pricingTitle: Simple Pricing for Your Perfect Day
pricingSubtitle: Choose the package that best fits your needs. All plans include dedicated support throughout your journey.
pricingNote: All plans include a 14-day satisfaction guarantee. Not sure which plan is right for you?
testimonialsSubtitle: Real stories from couples who trusted us with their special day
testimonial1: Our wedding website was absolutely perfect! The team captured our style perfectly and made the whole process so easy.
testimonial2: The RSVP system saved us so much time. Our guests loved how easy it was to navigate and find all the information.
testimonial3: Professional, responsive, and creative. They turned our vision into reality and exceeded our expectations!
browseTemplates: Browse our curated collection of wedding website templates, each designed to reflect your unique style.
elegantDesc: A timeless design with refined typography and subtle accents.
modernDesc: Clean lines and minimalist design for the contemporary couple.
romanticDesc: Soft curves and delicate details for a dreamy, romantic feel.
contactSubtitle: Choose your preferred way to connect with us. We're ready to answer any questions about our wedding website services.
availableHours: Monday through Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST
builtWithLove: Built with love by Vow Perfect
ctaDescription: Book your consultation before May 30th and receive a special discount on any package.
